lines.text: My father wants to see me. He sure took his sweet ass-time about it.
I'm not going to waste all of your time so I'm just going a few words. Like all of you, I would like to move on in life. Thank you.
When I was 18, my father used to call me "numbnuts" and "dumbass".
Why don't you go take a flying fuck?
This is what they do. Kill their selves by walking into trains?
I wrote a letter, didn't I?
15 years and one god damn letter? Fuck you!
Fuck "There it is"! Don't you see I care about you?
